sources.title: 13th Man (1937)
sources.description: Weldon Heyburn, Inez Courtney, Milburn Stone

sources.title: The 13th Man
sources.description: The murder of a district attorney is investigated by two reporters, one of whom is played by Milburn Stone (Doc Adams in "Gunsmoke").

sources.title: The 13th Man (1937) MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Weldon Heyburn, Inez Courtney, Selmer Jackson
 Director: William Nigh

 A tough district attorney has been cleaning up the town, and has already imprisoned twelve dangerous criminals. As he is about to name the target for his next investigation, he is murdered in the midst of a crowd. The police have many suspects and hardly any clues, so two reporters decide to investigate for themselves.

metadata.Plot: A tough district attorney has been cleaning up the town, and has already imprisoned twelve dangerous criminals. As he is about to name the target for his next investigation, he is murdered in the midst of a crowd. The police have many suspects and hardly any clues, so two reporters decide to investigate for themselves.
